timeline.message:

timeline.bodyText: Is this a debug message left?

replies.bodyText:
This is intentional to make the message visible even though logging would not be configured (as is the case typically when you run the tests on eclipse)
I can remove it if that is preferred?

replies.bodyText: Should imho be ok as it is just for the tests.
